name: tududi
title: Tududi
description: An extension to access tududi features from Raycast
author: david_leibovych

preferences.name: apiUrl
preferences.title: API Base URL
preferences.description: The base URL for the Tududi API

commands.name: all-tasks
commands.title: All Tasks
commands.subtitle: View all tududi tasks
commands.description: Browse all Tududi tasks directly from Raycast

commands.name: create-task
commands.title: Create Task
commands.subtitle: Create Tududi Task
commands.description: Quickly add a Tududi task with rich options

commands.name: create-note
commands.title: Create Note
commands.subtitle: Creates new tududi note
commands.description: Compose detailed Tududi notes without leaving Raycast

commands.name: all-notes
commands.title: All Notes
commands.subtitle: Shows all tududi notes
commands.description: Review every Tududi note alongside tags and projects

commands.name: today-tasks
commands.title: Today Tasks
commands.subtitle: Tasks that are planned for today
commands.description: Focus on Tududi tasks scheduled for completion today

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
